name: Oni containment
description:
Controls: A and D/arrow keys to move, Spacebar to attack, Q to change weapon

You play as a Ronin who have stole the 3 legendary weapons from their pedestals, but you found out that those weapons were the only thing holding the human and the demon realm apart. So now you have to lock the weapons back to their pedestals before it is to late and the human world becomes overrun by demons
